title: mol_info
description: The structure information derived from computation for a molecule entry in database

inchi.description: InChi string representation of the molecule

inchi_key.description: Hashed InChi string of the molecule

source_group.description: The source of the original molecular structure

init_structure.description: Initial starting xyz structure for calculations

groundState_charge.description: Charge of the ground state molecule

groundState_spin.description: Spin multiplicity of the ground state molecule

number_of_atoms.description: Number of atoms in the molecule

molecular_weight.description: Molecular weight of the molecule in g/mol

state_of_matter.description: Molecule's state of matter (solid, liquid, etc.) at room temperature

intended_use.description: Classification of molecule as catholyte, anolyte, or bipolar
